plugin.name: ttt-idc-infra
plugin.description: TravelTimeTable template for infrasound Is phase using by default the IDC model.

parameter.name: tables
parameter.description: The registered tables which can be used by applications. It should contain "IDC_2010" as this model ships by default.

parameter.name: distances
parameter.description: Defines the list of configured distances for which a celerity must exist. This means that the list of distances and celerities must have the same length.

parameter.name: celerities
parameter.description: Defines the list of configured celerities for which a distance must exist. This means that the list of distances and celerities must have the same length.
